article.title: Raytheon to Provide Jackal Passive Infrared Defeat Systems
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Raytheon Company, Indianapolis, Indiana, was recently awarded a $47 million contract for 250 Jackal passive infrared defeat systems as part of the Rapid Acquisition Authority to respond to combat emergencies. Picatinny Arsenal, New Jersey, is the contracting activity.
